name: Characterful Vintage Cowhide Leather English Chesterfield 3-Seater Sofa

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use. Minor fading. Over the years, it has developed natural signs of use and a stunning patina (see photos). At some point in its history, one seat cushion has been repaired. Structurally, it remains in good condition and is ready for immediate use.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Are you looking for a sofa with distinct character and a well-worn yet luxurious appearance? Then this full-grain leather 3-seater Chesterfield is the perfect match! Its rugged color, signature look, and elegant details make it a timeless statement piece that showcases the very best of the beloved English Chesterfield style. This sofa features three loose seat cushions for added comfort. Over the years, it has developed natural signs of use and a stunning patina (see photos). At some point in its history, one seat cushion has been repaired. Structurally, it remains in good condition and is ready for immediate use. With proper care and maintenance, this fantastic sofa can be enjoyed for many more years. The classic Chesterfield style remains a favorite for many, and we completely understand why! No matter your interior style, a Chesterfield always fits right in. Please note: The dimensions listed in our advertisement text are leading. Photos are part of the description. Dimensions: Height: 74 cm Width: 212 cm Depth: 95 cm Seat height: 50 cm Seat depth: 60 cm
